long_description: Offering core protection from the worst wind, the durable Patagonia Adze vest combines wind-blocking fabric with a moisture-wicking grid fleece backer that keeps you warm and dry in cold conditions. Polartec(R) Windbloc(R) stretch-woven polyester soft-shell fabric stops wind; Durable Water Repellent finish resists precipitation. Grid fleece backer warms and wicks moisture. Microfleece-lined neck and windflap provide next-to-skin comfort. Drawcord hem seals out drafts and holds in heat. The Patagonia Adze vest features harness- and pack-friendly hand pockets and an internal zip chest pocket, all with smooth, reverse- coil zippers. Regular fit.
short_description: Offering core protection from the worst wind, the durable Patagonia Adze vest combines wind-blocking fabric with a moisture-wicking grid fleece backer that keeps you warm and dry in cold conditions.
